pages.text: Carrying around enough Ink with you to maintain your magical equipment has become both a chore and a space hog in your inventory.$(br)Now that you're familiar with Ink, it's time for a new creation: the Pigment Palette.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Capable of storing sizable amounts of Ink, making you able to supply all your magical devices and equipment.$(br)$(italic)Now you are a true Artist of Color.
